00187 /* 8bit, color or not */
00188 #define CV_LOAD_IMAGE_UNCHANGED  -1
00189 /* 8bit, gray */
00190 #define CV_LOAD_IMAGE_GRAYSCALE   0
00191 /* ?, color */
00192 #define CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR       1
00193 /* any depth, ? */
00194 #define CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH    2
00195 /* ?, any color */
00196 #define CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR    4
00197 
00198 /* load image from file
00199   iscolor can be a combination of above flags where CV_LOAD_IMAGE_UNCHANGED
00200   overrides the other flags
00201   using CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYCOLOR alone is equivalent to CV_LOAD_IMAGE_UNCHANGED
00202   unless CV_LOAD_IMAGE_ANYDEPTH is specified images are converted to 8bit
00203 */
00204 CVAPI(IplImage*) cvLoadImage( const char* filename, int iscolor CV_DEFAULT(CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR));
00205 CVAPI(CvMat*) cvLoadImageM( const char* filename, int iscolor CV_DEFAULT(CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR));

00209 #define CV_IMWRITE_PXM_BINARY 32

00278 /* get the frame grabbed with cvGrabFrame(..)

00280   frame decompression, flipping etc.

00321 #ifndef SWIG
00322 #define CV_FOURCC(c1,c2,c3,c4)  \
00323     (((c1)&255) + (((c2)&255)<<8) + (((c3)&255)<<16) + (((c4)&255)<<24))
00324 #else
00325   // Prototype for CV_FOURCC so that swig can generate wrapper without mixing up the define
00326   int CV_FOURCC(char c1, char c2, char c3, char c4);
00327 #endif
00328 
00329 #define CV_FOURCC_PROMPT -1  /* Open Codec Selection Dialog (Windows only) */

00384 CV_INLINE int iplWidth( const IplImage* img );
00385 CV_INLINE int iplWidth( const IplImage* img )
00386 {
00387     return !img ? 0 : !img->roi ? img->width : img->roi->width;
00388 }
00389 
00390 CV_INLINE int iplHeight( const IplImage* img );
00391 CV_INLINE int iplHeight( const IplImage* img )
00392 {
00393     return !img ? 0 : !img->roi ? img->height : img->roi->height;
00394 }

00400 /* For use with Win32 */
00401 #if defined WIN32 || defined _WIN32
00402 
00403 CV_INLINE RECT NormalizeRect( RECT r );
00404 CV_INLINE RECT NormalizeRect( RECT r )
00405 {
00406     int t;
00407 
00408     if( r.left > r.right )
00409     {
00410         t = r.left;
00411         r.left = r.right;
00412         r.right = t;
00413     }
00414 
00415     if( r.top > r.bottom )
00416     {
00417         t = r.top;
00418         r.top = r.bottom;
00419         r.bottom = t;
00420     }
00421 
00422     return r;
00423 }
00424 
00425 CV_INLINE CvRect RectToCvRect( RECT sr );
00426 CV_INLINE CvRect RectToCvRect( RECT sr )
00427 {
00428     sr = NormalizeRect( sr );
00429     return cvRect( sr.left, sr.top, sr.right - sr.left, sr.bottom - sr.top );
00430 }
00431 
00432 CV_INLINE RECT CvRectToRect( CvRect sr );
00433 CV_INLINE RECT CvRectToRect( CvRect sr )
00434 {
00435     RECT dr;
00436     dr.left = sr.x;
00437     dr.top = sr.y;
00438     dr.right = sr.x + sr.width;
00439     dr.bottom = sr.y + sr.height;
00440 
00441     return dr;
00442 }
00443 
00444 CV_INLINE IplROI RectToROI( RECT r );
00445 CV_INLINE IplROI RectToROI( RECT r )
00446 {
00447     IplROI roi;
00448     r = NormalizeRect( r );
00449     roi.xOffset = r.left;
00450     roi.yOffset = r.top;
00451     roi.width = r.right - r.left;
00452     roi.height = r.bottom - r.top;
00453     roi.coi = 0;
00454 
00455     return roi;
00456 }
00457 
00458 #endif /* WIN32 */

00461 }  /* end of extern "C" */
00462 #endif /* __cplusplus */

00465 #if defined __cplusplus && !defined CV_NO_CVV_IMAGE
00466 
00467 /* CvvImage class definition */
00468 class CV_EXPORTS CvvImage
00469 {
00470 public:
00471     CvvImage();
00472     virtual ~CvvImage();
00473 
00474     /* Create image (BGR or grayscale) */
00475     virtual bool  Create( int width, int height, int bits_per_pixel, int image_origin = 0 );
00476 
00477     /* Load image from specified file */
00478     virtual bool  Load( const char* filename, int desired_color = 1 );
00479 
00480     /* Load rectangle from the file */
00481     virtual bool  LoadRect( const char* filename,
00482                             int desired_color, CvRect r );
00483 
00484 #if defined WIN32 || defined _WIN32
00485     virtual bool  LoadRect( const char* filename,
00486                             int desired_color, RECT r )
00487     {
00488         return LoadRect( filename, desired_color,
00489                          cvRect( r.left, r.top, r.right - r.left, r.bottom - r.top ));
00490     }
00491 #endif
00492 
00493     /* Save entire image to specified file. */
00494     virtual bool  Save( const char* filename );
00495 
00496     /* Get copy of input image ROI */
00497     virtual void  CopyOf( CvvImage& image, int desired_color = -1 );
00498     virtual void  CopyOf( IplImage* img, int desired_color = -1 );
00499 
00500     IplImage* GetImage() { return m_img; };
00501     virtual void  Destroy(void);
00502 
00503     /* width and height of ROI */
00504     int Width() { return !m_img ? 0 : !m_img->roi ? m_img->width : m_img->roi->width; };
00505     int Height() { return !m_img ? 0 : !m_img->roi ? m_img->height : m_img->roi->height;};
00506     int Bpp() { return m_img ? (m_img->depth & 255)*m_img->nChannels : 0; };
00507 
00508     virtual void  Fill( int color );
00509 
00510     /* draw to highgui window */
00511     virtual void  Show( const char* window );
00512 
00513 #if defined WIN32 || defined _WIN32
00514     /* draw part of image to the specified DC */
00515     virtual void  Show( HDC dc, int x, int y, int width, int height,
00516                         int from_x = 0, int from_y = 0 );
00517     /* draw the current image ROI to the specified rectangle of the destination DC */
00518     virtual void  DrawToHDC( HDC hDCDst, RECT* pDstRect );
00519 #endif
00520 
00521 protected:
00522 
00523     IplImage*  m_img;
00524 };

00529 #endif /* __cplusplus */
